md:
giải nghĩa từ "commuting" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Commuting (verb) - Đi lại hàng ngày

* Meaning: to travel regularly from your home to your place of work, school, etc.
* Example: She commutes to work by train every day.
* Related words: commuter, commute time, daily commute

2. Commuting (noun) - Đi lại hàng ngày

* Meaning: the act of traveling regularly from your home to your place of work, school, etc.
* Example: The commuting time in this city is very long.
* Related words: commuter, commute, daily commute

Note: Commuting can be used as both a verb and a noun, but the meaning is slightly different. As a verb, it refers to the action of traveling regularly, while as a noun, it refers to the act of traveling regularly.
